hl.seg: Tea: Effective cure of Chest Cancer

doc.seg: In a new research study there are claims that drinking 3 cups of tea everyday

who drink at least three cups of tea everyday is reduced by 37%.
The research study also claims that it does not help older women even if they drink three or more cups of tea daily.
Specialists think that this is because of the presence of such components in tea that are more effective against the types of cancer tumors which usually target women under 50 years of age.
Research was done on 5000 women who had Breast Cancer treatment at Moffitt Cancer Center in Tampa,Florida.
Their ages were between 20 and 74 years.
Specialists compared their medical records and lifestyles to those women who were free of breast cancer.
Specialists also found that tea had the most effect on one specific kind of breast cancer, Lobes. It reduced the risk by 66%.
One on every ten breast cancer patients has this kind of cancer.
This type of breast cancer is dangerous because it is deep inside and usually only diagnosed when it has become widespread.
Specialists found that having at least three cups of tea every day can readily reduce the chances of breast cancer in women of younger ages.
They found that incorporating tea as a regular drink in your daily routine helps create immunity against the cancer.
Almost 40,000 women are diagnosed with breast cancer in Britain.

The pumping of the blood by the heart, its contraction and relaxation was studied.
